items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great quality sweater
items.body: I've bought many cardigan sweaters in my 41 year career as a hairstylist. I wear them just about every day that I work during the fall and winter months. In the past, I've had little luck, and tons of bad luck where I either returned the sweaters because they weren't the right size, the fit and quality were horrible, were too short, etc, etc. Not this sweater.. It's a gem! I knew by the feel of it before I looked at it and tried it on that it was a hit! It's a heavy but thin sweater if that makes sense. I could feel by the heaviness before trying it on that it's made really well. Keeping my fingers crossed, I tried it on and it was perfect! Sleeve length was perfect, the silver buttons on the wrist area is just enough detail to make this a bit more stylish than just a casual cardigan. The color is true black, the length is perfect and the fit around my chest ( size 42D) and shoulder areas are nice too. It will be comfortable working in it. I have broad shoulders and sometimes the fit around my chest is too tight or doesn't hang right in the front, but this style does. It comes together perfectly in the front..it doesn't over lap and there's no gap where it's too small. It's very flattering too. Has a straight look to it. I'm going to order a few more in hopes that they all fit the same. I'm 5ft 4in tall and take an XL or XXL ( or 1X). I ordered an XXL. The fit is perfect for a sleeveless tank top or long sleeve thin shirt under it. It hits right above my knees. Im so happy with this sweater. It'll be a nice addition to my work wardrobe throughout the next couple seasons. A+++++ Update: I ordered a 2nd cardigan sweater. Same size and color. The 2nd one seemed smaller and tighter than the 1st one that I bought. Sleeve length was the same but around my chest area it seemed a bit smaller and snug fitting. I checked the sizes on both and I did receive 2 of the same size sweaters ( bought at different times about 2 weeks apart ) Just want to put it out there that this might be a possibility if you buy more than one of these cardigans. Skeptical now because I planned on buying more as the season starts to get colder. Now? Most likely not. Bummer Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our go to sweater
items.body: So comfy! It’s such a well made sweater and it’s soft and classy looks beautiful with a dress or jeans! I love it and I will buy other colors!I would recommend it if you’re looking for a lighter weight sweater. Read more
items.author: Cindy F.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good fit and cute detail
items.body: The material feels soft, comfortable, and quality. The buttons on the sleeves are a nice little detail. They look a bit cheap if you look too close, but from afar they're a nice, classy detail. Perfect for spring and fall transition outfits. Read more
items.author: Valerie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater!
items.body: I had “Saved for Later,” a sweater just like this one, but at a higher price, hoping it would go on sale. So, when I spotted this one at a much better price, I snapped it up without hesitation. It’s somewhat lightweight, but warm enough for a cool evening or chilly restaurant. And I love the gold button detail on the sleeves. I bought this in black, size medium which I consider my usual size. Fits perfectly on my 5’6”, 122 lb. body. It comes in so many colors, I may consider buying another. Very happy with this one! Read more
items.author: Clare

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & comfortable
items.body: Great cardigan. I like the length of the sleeves- not too short when you put your arms forward. The small buttons on the sleeves are decorative and look cute. Casual or dressy it looks nice and feels nice too. Read more
items.author: Diane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful drape
items.body: Perfect weight. Great fabric. Nice details. Great fit. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice lightweight sweater
items.body: Runs small. But it is very pretty. Read more
items.author: meg handley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surch no further, this is exactly what you're looking for
items.body: I bought a black sweater and knew I just had to have another one, so I bought another color . This is such great quality. Im so happy with both purchases. I recommend this to every one .. You WILL be happy .. Read more
items.author: Debi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Camel Heather, Burgundy, Olive Green, Dark Grey, Magenta, Hot Pink, Black, Camel, Orange, Red, Navy, Off-white, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
